translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞くのが私の何よりの幸せなの」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hearing it is my greatest happiness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしてもあなたも聞いてた？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, were you listening too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のお茶水問答」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That recent tea and water exchange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私もお茶飲んでもいいですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "May I also have some tea?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目、奴隷は水。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, slaves only get water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなぁ、クスン……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, sniffle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつものこれね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the usual thing, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これのポイントはね、あなた？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The point here is, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、熱いのがシィルちゃんさんってとこよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, the one who's passionate is Shir-chan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎回聞くのよ？　私も飲んでいいですか、って！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every time she asks, 'Can I drink some too?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その度に駄目だって言われても明日も聞くわけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if she’s told no every time, she asks again tomorrow!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはまあランス様の機嫌次第によっては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, depending on Master Rance's mood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、たまにはいいだろうということもあるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes it’s okay, so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞くのは当然にしても毎日聞くわけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: asking is natural, but she asks every day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この会話自体を楽しんでる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they enjoying this conversation itself?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう解釈も出来るけど個人的には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could interpret it that way, but personally,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にお茶飲みたいだけかなって思うの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think they just really want to drink tea!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、そっちはそっちで美味しいな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that side of it is delicious in its own way!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って私としては思うわけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s what I think, anyway!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それってつまりアレでしょ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So basically, that means,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎度毎度、同じレベルの会話を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: every time, the same level of conversation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも素の状態で楽しめてる状態でしょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is enjoyed sincerely every time, right!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昨日も今日も明日も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yesterday, today, and tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ会話をこの二人は飽きずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these two never get bored of the same conversation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るってことでしょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and can have it, right!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが！　もう！　なんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s just! Geez! What the heck!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あと、シィルちゃんさんって意外と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, Shir-chan is surprisingly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常識人でなくそういうポンヤリなとこが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not exactly sensible; that kind of spacey side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構この二人同レベルのオツムよねって感じで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: makes it feel like these two are on the same level mentally!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう！　くあっ！　あっ、くっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah geez! Ugh! Ah, ugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んだよっ！　もうっ！　熟年夫婦かよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the heck! Jeez! Like an old married couple!
So passionate~~~~~!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、お茶飲んでもいいよする時もあるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, sometimes I do say it’s okay to drink tea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずしも聞く意味がないかというと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it’s not that asking has no meaning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決してそんなこともないんだけどね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s definitely not like that~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにしてもお二人のこんな近くで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, to hear such a conversation so close from these two,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな会話が聞ける喜び……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the joy of being able to listen to this...
Hmm...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ……嘘……嘘でしょ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... It can't be... really...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなみさんとまそーさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami-san and Maso-san are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ席に座ってる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sitting together in the same seat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　誤解はしないでね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No! Don’t misunderstand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に二人に今までそんな場面なかったって言うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say they’ve never had such a situation before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと今までに何度もあったのよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: actually, it’s happened many times before!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、二人ともマリアさんと違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unlike Maria-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいう性格だから雑談？　となると、ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their personalities make small talk... well, that’s that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってなわけで結構テンション上がるわよ、これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, it really raises my excitement, this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっべ……涎出て来た……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no... I’m drooling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集音マイク、集音マイク……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Directional mic, directional mic...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s what I think, anyway!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So basically, that means,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yesterday, today, and tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ会話をこの二人は飽きずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these two never get bored of the same conversation,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and can have it, right!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが！　もう！　なんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s just! Geez! What the heck!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, Shir-chan is surprisingly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常識人でなくそういうポンヤリなとこが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not exactly sensible; that kind of spacey side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構この二人同レベルのオツムよねって感じで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: makes it feel like these two are on the same level mentally!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah geez! Ugh! Ah, ugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んだよっ！　もうっ！　熟年夫婦かよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the heck! Jeez! Like an old married couple!
So passionate~~~~~!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、お茶飲んでもいいよする時もあるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, sometimes I do say it’s okay to drink tea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ずしも聞く意味がないかというと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it’s not that asking has no meaning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決してそんなこともないんだけどね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s definitely not like that~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにしてもお二人のこんな近くで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, to hear such a conversation so close from these two,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな会話が聞ける喜び……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the joy of being able to listen to this...
Hmm...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やだ……嘘……嘘でしょ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... It can't be... really...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなみさんとまそーさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami-san and Maso-san are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ席に座ってる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sitting together in the same seat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや！　誤解はしないでね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No! Don’t misunderstand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別に二人に今までそんな場面なかったって言うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say they’ve never had such a situation before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと今までに何度もあったのよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: actually, it’s happened many times before!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、二人ともマリアさんと違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unlike Maria-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいう性格だから雑談？　となると、ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their personalities make small talk... well, that’s that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってなわけで結構テンション上がるわよ、これ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, it really raises my excitement, this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっべ……涎出て来た……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no... I’m drooling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集音マイク、集音マイク……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Directional mic, directional mic...
